pkgmetadata.longdescription: # graphql-limitsFeatures included: - Limit Query Depth- [Limit Query Nodes](https://docs.github.com/en/graphql/overview/resource-limitations)### Prerequisites - [graphql-core](https://github.com/graphql-python/graphql-core) ### Installation - `pip install graphql-limits` ### Usage example ```pythonquery_string = ''' query Test($first: Int) { viewer { books(first: $first) { author { books(first: 4) { author { books(first: 100) { author { id } } } } } } } }'''schema = graphene.Schema(query=Query)backend = ProtectorBackend(nodes_limit=399, depth_limit=5, variable_values={'first': 2})result = schema.execute(query_string, backend=backend, variable_values={'first': 2})```
